mapper.select: select output_warehouse_key, shop_code, shop_name, goods_code, goods_name, customer_code, customer_name,output_shop_code,output_shop_name, output_plan, output_price, output_actual, inventory_code, position_code, create_time, deadline_time, status, type, shop_people_code, inventory_people_code, return_reason,vehicle_code,is_deleted,return_num from output_warehouse where output_warehouse_key = #{outputWarehouseKey}
mapper.insert: insert into output_warehouse(output_warehouse_key,shop_code, shop_name, goods_code, goods_name, customer_code, customer_name,output_shop_code,output_shop_name, output_plan, output_price, output_actual, inventory_code, position_code, create_time, deadline_time, status, type, shop_people_code, inventory_people_code, return_reason,vehicle_code,is_deleted,return_num) values (#{outputWarehouseKey},#{shopCode}, #{shopName}, #{goodsCode}, #{goodsName}, #{customerCode}, #{customerName},#{outputShopCode},#{outputShopName}, #{outputPlan}, #{outputPrice}, #{outputActual}, #{inventoryCode}, #{positionCode}, #{createTime}, #{deadlineTime}, #{status}, #{type}, #{shopPeopleCode}, #{inventoryPeopleCode}, #{returnReason},#{vehicleCode},#{isDeleted},#{returnNum})

on duplicate key update shop_code = values(shop_code), shop_name = values(shop_name), goods_code = values(goods_code), goods_name = values(goods_name), customer_code = values(customer_code), customer_name = values(customer_name), output_shop_code = values(output_shop_code), output_shop_name = values(output_shop_name), output_plan = values(output_plan), output_price = values(output_price), output_actual = values(output_actual), inventory_code = values(inventory_code), position_code = values(position_code), create_time = values(create_time), deadline_time = values(deadline_time), status = values(status), type = values(type), shop_people_code = values(shop_people_code), inventory_people_code = values(inventory_people_code), return_reason = values(return_reason), vehicle_code = values(vehicle_code), is_deleted = values(is_deleted), return_num=values(return_num)

where output_warehouse_key = #{outputWarehouseKey}
